text: What is the best way to convert a string on the format "1-2-3-4" to a list [1, 2, 3, 4]?
The string may also be empty, in which case the conversion should return an empty list [].

code:
map(lambda x: int(x),
    filter(lambda x: x != '',
           "1-2-3-4".split('-')))

text: EDIT: Sorry all of those who answered before I corrected my question, it was unclear for the first minute or so.
